## Experimental Map

This manual explains how to properly design your 384-well plate, including the experimental map for dyes and well plate ID's to map predictions back to individual wells. 

In the **figure** below, the experimental map is outlined in the form of a 384-well plate.

Dyes (color fill of cell): <mark> white = blank,</mark> <mark> yellow = universal </mark>

**Important:** Each 384-well plate produces predictions for 2 96-well plates. The odd numbered rows are "plate 1". The even numbered rows are "plate 2"
